00029 #ifndef LNET_DLC_H
00030 #define LNET_DLC_H
00031 
00032 #include <libcfs/libcfs_ioctl.h>
00033 #include <lnet/types.h>
00034 
00035 #define MAX_NUM_SHOW_ENTRIES    32
00036 #define LNET_MAX_STR_LEN        128
00037 #define LNET_MAX_SHOW_NUM_CPT   128
00038 #define LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS     ((__u32) -1)
00039 
00040 struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_cmn_tunables {
00041         __u32 lct_version;
00042         __u32 lct_peer_timeout;
00043         __u32 lct_peer_tx_credits;
00044         __u32 lct_peer_rtr_credits;
00045         __u32 lct_max_tx_credits;
00046 };
00047 
00048 struct lnet_ioctl_config_o2iblnd_tunables {
00049         __u32 lnd_version;
00050         __u32 lnd_peercredits_hiw;
00051         __u32 lnd_map_on_demand;
00052         __u32 lnd_concurrent_sends;
00053         __u32 lnd_fmr_pool_size;
00054         __u32 lnd_fmr_flush_trigger;
00055         __u32 lnd_fmr_cache;
00056         __u32 pad;
00057 };
00058 
00059 struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables {
00060         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_cmn_tunables lt_cmn;
00061         union {
00062                 struct lnet_ioctl_config_o2iblnd_tunables lt_o2ib;
00063         } lt_tun_u;
00064 };
00065 
00066 struct lnet_ioctl_net_config {
00067         char ni_interfaces[LNET_MAX_INTERFACES][LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00068         __u32 ni_status;
00069         __u32 ni_cpts[LNET_MAX_SHOW_NUM_CPT];
00070         char cfg_bulk[0];
00071 };
00072 
00073 #define LNET_TINY_BUF_IDX       0
00074 #define LNET_SMALL_BUF_IDX      1
00075 #define LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX      2
00076 
00077 /* # different router buffer pools */
00078 #define LNET_NRBPOOLS           (LNET_LARGE_BUF_IDX + 1)
00079 
00080 struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg {
00081         struct {
00082                 __u32 pl_npages;
00083                 __u32 pl_nbuffers;
00084                 __u32 pl_credits;
00085                 __u32 pl_mincredits;
00086         } pl_pools[LNET_NRBPOOLS];
00087         __u32 pl_routing;
00088 };
00089 
00090 struct lnet_ioctl_config_data {
00091         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr cfg_hdr;
00092 
00093         __u32 cfg_net;
00094         __u32 cfg_count;
00095         __u64 cfg_nid;
00096         __u32 cfg_ncpts;
00097 
00098         union {
00099                 struct {
00100                         __u32 rtr_hop;
00101                         __u32 rtr_priority;
00102                         __u32 rtr_flags;
00103                 } cfg_route;
00104                 struct {
00105                         char net_intf[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00106                         __s32 net_peer_timeout;
00107                         __s32 net_peer_tx_credits;
00108                         __s32 net_peer_rtr_credits;
00109                         __s32 net_max_tx_credits;
00110                         __u32 net_cksum_algo;
00111                         __u32 net_interface_count;
00112                 } cfg_net;
00113                 struct {
00114                         __u32 buf_enable;
00115                         __s32 buf_tiny;
00116                         __s32 buf_small;
00117                         __s32 buf_large;
00118                 } cfg_buffers;
00119         } cfg_config_u;
00120 
00121         char cfg_bulk[0];
00122 };
00123 
00124 struct lnet_ioctl_peer {
00125         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr pr_hdr;
00126         __u32 pr_count;
00127         __u32 pr_pad;
00128         __u64 pr_nid;
00129 
00130         union {
00131                 struct {
00132                         char cr_aliveness[LNET_MAX_STR_LEN];
00133                         __u32 cr_refcount;
00134                         __u32 cr_ni_peer_tx_credits;
00135                         __u32 cr_peer_tx_credits;
00136                         __u32 cr_peer_rtr_credits;
00137                         __u32 cr_peer_min_rtr_credits;
00138                         __u32 cr_peer_tx_qnob;
00139                         __u32 cr_ncpt;
00140                 } pr_peer_credits;
00141         } pr_lnd_u;
00142 };
00143 
00144 struct lnet_ioctl_lnet_stats {
00145         struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr st_hdr;
00146         struct lnet_counters st_cntrs;
00147 };
00148 
00149 #endif /* LNET_DLC_H */
